seriesJson.title: Split the lark and you'll hear the music
seriesJson.description: A special that focuses on the poetry and letters of 19th century American poet Emily Dickinson.

node.title: Poetry and letters of Emily Dickinson
node.description: To celebrate the 1971 issuing of an Emily Dickinson postage stamp, actress Mildred Dunnock presents a program pairing the poetry of Dickinson with the music of Robert Schumann.
